databaseConfig.sql:
SELECT MS_ITEM_SBT.MS_ITEM_SBT_ID , MS_ITEM_SBT.ITEM_SBT_NAME , MS_ITEM_SBT.SEND_FLAG , MS_ITEM_SBT.VESSEL_ID , MS_ITEM_SBT.DATA_NO , MS_ITEM_SBT.USER_KEY , MS_ITEM_SBT.RENEW_DATE , MS_ITEM_SBT.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_ITEM_SBT.TS FROM MS_ITEM_SBT
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 0

SELECT MS_ITEM_SBT.MS_ITEM_SBT_ID , MS_ITEM_SBT.ITEM_SBT_NAME , MS_ITEM_SBT.SEND_FLAG , MS_ITEM_SBT.VESSEL_ID , MS_ITEM_SBT.DATA_NO , MS_ITEM_SBT.USER_KEY , MS_ITEM_SBT.RENEW_DATE , MS_ITEM_SBT.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_ITEM_SBT.TS FROM MS_ITEM_SBT WHERE MS_ITEM_SBT.MS_ITEM_SBT_ID = :MS_ITEM_SBT_ID

INSERT INTO MS_ITEM_SBT ( MS_ITEM_SBT_ID , ITEM_SBT_NAME , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES ( :MS_ITEM_SBT_ID , :ITEM_SBT_NAME , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_ITEM_SBT SET ITEM_SBT_NAME = :ITEM_SBT_NAME , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS WHERE MS_ITEM_SBT_ID = :MS_ITEM_SBT_ID AND TS = :TS
